variations.template: Put <number:a_or_word> +1/+1 counter<number:plural:s> on it or create a <number>/<number> white Spirit creature token.
rts: Put a +1/+1 counter on it or create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token.
Put two +1/+1 counters on it or create a 2/2 white Spirit creature token.
Put three +1/+1 counters on it or create a 3/3 white Spirit creature token.
